snippet: The Postal Service reported a net loss of $586 million in the quarter that ended in June, an improvement over a $2 billion loss at the same time last year.
abstract: United States Postal Service reports second-quarter loss of $586 million, compared with loss of almost $2 billion in year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: The Postal Service reported a net loss of $586 million in the quarter that ended in June, an improvement over a $2 billion loss at the same time last year.

headline.main: Loss of $586 Million Shows Improvement for Postal Service
headline.print_headline: Loss of $586 Million Shows Improvement for Postal Service
